BackstoryDef.title: neural interface unit
BackstoryDef.description: This droid was manufactured as part of the advanced Paradroid neural network system. Designed to facilitate communication between artificial and organic intelligence, it possesses sophisticated social protocols and learning algorithms.

BackstoryDef.title: utility maintenance unit
BackstoryDef.description: A standard utility droid designed for maintenance, construction, and general labor tasks. This unit operates under its original programming directives, focused on efficiency and task completion.

BackstoryDef.title: corrupted warfare unit
BackstoryDef.description: This droid's original programming has been overwritten by malicious code. Once a peaceful utility unit, it now views organic life as a threat to be eliminated or upgraded through force.

BackstoryDef.title: experienced neural interface
BackstoryDef.description: Through countless interactions with various species and cultures, this neural interface droid has developed advanced understanding of biological psychology and social dynamics.

BackstoryDef.title: veteran maintenance unit
BackstoryDef.description: Decades of maintenance work have optimized this droid's efficiency protocols. It has become an expert at resource management and infrastructure maintenance.
